document.full_text: explosions were heard north of yemen's capital on wednesday as street fighting returned to sanaa between a powerful tribal group and forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses said.
document.title: explosions heard north of yemen capital: witnesses
lines_and_colors: explosions were heard north of yemen's capital on wednesday as street fighting returned to sanaa between a powerful tribal group and forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses said.
